name: Alice Smith
description: I am a japanese Chef. I make so many japanese foods. you can try my recipe and if you love this recipe then give me your valuable likes.

recipes.name: Sushi
recipes.description: Sushi is made of specially prepared vinegared rice, usually with some sugar and salt, combined with a variety of ingredients, such as seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits. Sushi is often served with pickled ginger, wasabi, and soy sauce.

recipes.name: Yakitori
recipes.description: Ramen is a Japanese noodle soup dish that consists of Chinese-style wheat noodles served in a meat or fish-based broth, often flavored with soy sauce or miso, and topped with ingredients such as sliced pork, dried seaweed, green onions, and corn.

recipes.name: Udon
recipes.description: Udon is a type of thick wheat flour noodle used in Japanese cuisine. It is often served hot as a noodle soup in a mildly flavored broth, flavored with soy sauce, mirin, and dashi, and topped with thinly sliced scallions, kamaboko, and tempura crumbs.
